DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective study assessment patient ' discomfort ocular redness follow cataract extraction surgery mean phacoemulsification intraocular lens implantation .
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Discomfort Ocular Redness Following Phacoemulsification Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Participants recruit Cataract Service University Hospital Alexandroupolis ( UHA ) consecutive-if-eligible basis . By mean custom computer randomization program participant randomly populate either study group ( receive Systane Ultra additional postoperative treatment ) control group ( receive standard postoperative treatment ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis senile cataract stage 2 3 nuclear opalescence accord Lens Opacities Classification System III ( LOCS3 ) grade scale 1 . Endothelial cell count less 1900 , 2 . Glaucoma , 3 . IOPlowering medication , 4 . Former incisional surgery , 5 . Former diagnosis corneal disease , 6 . Diabetes autoimmune diseases 7 . Former diagnosis dry eye disease
